price: Por certo, Nós o fizemos um Alcorão árabe, para razoardes.
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan laʿallakum taʿqilūna
